Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开文档
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open a document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 创建新文档
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Create a new document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 保存文档
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Save the document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 关闭文档
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Close the document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将所选内容剪切到剪贴板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cut the selected content to the Clipboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将所选内容复制到剪贴板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copy the selected content to the Clipboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 粘贴剪贴板的内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Paste the contents of the Clipboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择所有文档内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select all document content

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 对文本应用加粗格式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Apply bold formatting to text

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 对文本应用italic格式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Apply italic formatting to text

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 对文本应用下划线格式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Apply underline formatting to text

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 逐磅减小字号
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Decrease the font size by 1 point

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 逐磅增大字号
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Center the text

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文本左对齐
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Align the text to the left

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 使文本居中
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Center the text

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文本右对齐
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Align the text to the right

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 取消命令
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cancel a command

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 撤消上一操作
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Undo the previous action

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 如果可能，请恢复上一操作
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Redo the previous action, if possible

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 拆分文档窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Split the document window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 撤消拆分文档窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Remove the document window split

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 撤消拆分文档窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Remove the document window split

Categories.ChineseCategoryName: 使用功能区选项卡的访问键
Categories.EnglishCategoryName: Use the Access Keys for ribbon tabs

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 移动到功能区上的“告诉我搜索”或“搜索”字段以搜索帮助或帮助内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move to the Tell Me or Search field on the Ribbon to search for assistance or Help content

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“文件”页以使用 Backstage 视图
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the File page to use Backstage view

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“开始”选项卡，使用常见的格式命令、段落样式和“查找”工具
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Home tab to use common formatting commands, paragraph styles, and the Find tool

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“插入”选项卡以插入表格、图片和形状、页眉或文本框
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Insert tab to insert tables, pictures and shapes, headers, or text boxes

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“设计”选项卡以使用主题、颜色和效果，如页面边框
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Design tab to use themes, colors, and effects, such as page borders

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“布局”选项卡以使用页边距、页面方向、缩进和间距
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Layout tab to work with page margins, page orientation, indentation, and spacing

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“引用”选项卡，添加目录、脚注或引文表
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the References tab to add a table of contents, footnotes, or a table of citations

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“邮件”选项卡以管理邮件合并任务以及处理信封和标签
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Mailings tab to manage Mail Merge tasks and to work with envelopes and labels

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“审阅”选项卡以使用拼写检查、设置校对语言，以及跟踪和审阅对文档的更改
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Review tab to use Spell Check, set proofing languages, and to track and review changes to your document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“视图”选项卡以选择文档视图或模式，例如阅读模式或大纲视图。 还可以设置缩放缩放和管理多个文档窗口
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the View tab to choose a document view or mode, such as Read Mode or Outline view. You can also set the zoom magnification and manage multiple document windows

Categories.EnglishCategoryName: Work in the ribbon with the keyboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择功能区的活动选项卡并激活访问键
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select the active tab on the ribbon, and activate the access keys

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点移动到功能区上的命令
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the focus to commands on the ribbon

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在功能区上的命令分组之间移动
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move between command groupings on the ribbon

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在功能区上的项目之间移动
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move among the items on the Ribbon

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 激活所选按钮
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Activate the selected button

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开所选命令的列表
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the list for the selected command

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开所选按钮的菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the menu for the selected button

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 展开或收起功能区
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Expand or collapse the ribbon

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开上下文菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the context menu

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 当主菜单处于打开或选中状态时，移到子菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move to the submenu when a main menu is open or selected

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标向左移动一个字词
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor one word to the left

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标向右移动一个字词
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor one word to the right

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标向上移动一个段落
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor up by one paragraph

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标向下移动一个段落
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor down by one paragraph

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到当前行的末尾
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the end of the current line

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到当前行的开头
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the beginning the current line

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到屏幕顶部
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the top of the screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到屏幕底部
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the bottom of the screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文档视图向上滚动一个屏幕来移动光标
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor by scrolling the document view up by one screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文档视图向下滚动一个屏幕来移动光标
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor by scrolling the document view down by one screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到下一页的顶部
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the top of the next page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到上一页的顶部
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the top of the previous page

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到文档末尾
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the end of the document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到文档的开头
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the beginning of the document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到上一修订的位置
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the cursor to the location of the previous revision

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 环绕文本框或图像等浮动形状
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cycle through floating shapes, such as text boxes or images

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 退出浮动形状导航并返回普通导航
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Exit the floating shape navigation and return to the normal navigation

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 显示“导航”任务窗格，在文档内容中搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Display the Navigation task pane, to search within the document content

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 显示“定位”对话框，导航到特定页面、书签、脚注、表格、批注、图形或其他位置
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Display the Go To dialog box, to navigate to a specific page, bookmark, footnote, table, comment, graphic, or other location

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 循环浏览之前对文档所做的更改的四个位置
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cycle through the locations of the four previous changes made to the document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打印文档
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Print the document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 切换到打印预览
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Switch to print preview

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在放大的预览页上移动
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move around the preview page when zoomed in

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在缩小显示比例时逐页翻阅预览页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move by one preview page when zoomed out

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在缩小显示比例时移至预览首页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move to the first preview page when zoomed out

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在缩小显示比例时移至最后一张预览页
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move to the last preview page when zoomed out

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择文本
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select text

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择左侧的单词
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select the word to the left

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择右侧单词
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select the word to the right

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从当前位置选择到当前行的开头
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select from the current position to the beginning of the current line

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从当前位置选择到当前行的末尾
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select from the current position to the end of the current line

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从当前位置选择到当前段落的开头
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select from the current position to the beginning of the current paragraph

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从当前位置选择到当前段落的末尾
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select from the current position to the end of the current paragraph

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从当前位置选择到屏幕顶部
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select from the current position to the top of the screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从当前位置选择到屏幕底部
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select from the current position to the bottom of the screen

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从当前位置选择文档开头
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select from the current position to the beginning of the document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从文档的当前位置选择到结尾
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select from the current position to the end of the document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从当前位置选择窗口底部
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select from the current position to the bottom of the window

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择所有文档内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select all document content

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 开始扩展所选内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Start extending the selection

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 向左或向右选择最近的字符
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select the nearest character to the left or right

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 减少选择
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Reduce the selection

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 纵向选择文字块
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select a vertical block of text.

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 停止扩展所选内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Stop extending the selection

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 向左删除一个字词
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Delete one word to the left

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 向右删除一个字词
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Delete one word to the right

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开剪贴板任务窗格，从而允许在应用之间复制和粘贴 Microsoft Office 内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Clipboard task pane and enable the Office Clipboard, which allows you to copy and paste content between Microsoft Office apps

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将所选内容剪切到剪贴板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cut the selected content to the Clipboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将所选内容复制到剪贴板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copy the selected content to the Clipboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 粘贴剪贴板的内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Paste the contents of the Clipboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 使用所选内容定义自动图文集块
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Define an AutoText block with the selected content

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将所选内容剪切到“峰值”
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cut the selected content to the Spike

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 粘贴 Spike 的内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Paste the contents of the Spike

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 复制所选格式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copy the selected formatting

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 粘贴所选格式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Paste the selected formatting

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 复制文档中上一节所使用的页眉或页脚
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copy the header or footer used in the previous section of the document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 显示“替换”对话框，查找和替换文本、特定格式或特殊项目
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Display the Replace dialog box, to find and replace text, specific formatting, or special items

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 显示“对象”对话框，将文件对象插入文档
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Display the Object dialog box, to insert a file object into the document

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 插入SmartArt图形
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Insert a SmartArt graphic

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 插入艺术字图形
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Insert a WordArt graphic
